title: tunjum pOdum
sahitya:
tunjum pOdum nenjam unakkE tuDikkum tuDiyuDaiyAi Om jyOti shivanE


anupallavi

  anjum anjum anjum anjum andak-karaNamuDam endai endai enrE


caraNam    kalattilum nilattilum gagana veLiyilum kaN kANA nADellAm vIN kAna senrum
nalattilum nalivilum valuttuyir nondAlum nAnenru nIyingE naTamADum kATSiyai
maruppEnO anbait-turappEnO inip-pirappEnO aruL surappOnE
